revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Qualot |image = [[File:Qualot.png]] |caption = Even in places of constant rain and high humidity, this Berry's plant grows healthy and strong. |growtime = 1h 20m 0s |harvest = 22 berries |replant = 20% |points = 550 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Qualot''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 10, but no more than 15 points of spicy, sweet and sour and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Cheri]], [[Pecha]] and [[Aspear]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 mins 50 secs || 16 mins 40 secs || 41 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 20 mins - 2 hours 40 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Qualot berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || || || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || |- | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |-style="height: 50px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |} {{Berries}}
